name: Xtreme League
detailed_description:
Go snowboarding whenever you like, regardless of the weather outside the window! Learn new tracks, get points and renew your board! Xtreme League is waiting for you!

Dreaming of snow slopes? Then this game is for you! Snowboard, try various tracks, compete with friends! You surely like our race modes! You can choose the race of your mood. What will it be today? Downhill race with time? Or full maneuver race with control points? You decide!

Features:


  • Several modes of descents;
  • Many tasks on the slope;
  • A variety of skins for your board.

short_description: Go snowboarding whenever you like, regardless of the weather outside the window! Learn new tracks, get points and renew your board! Xtreme League is waiting for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: Intel single core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2011 GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
